Attacks.Name: Vine Lash
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is given the Rooted special condition, preventing movement during their next activation.

Attacks.Name: Razor Leaf Barrage
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to each character within range and line of sight of the target character.

Attacks.Name: Toxic
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Poison special condition and loses 1 power.

Superpowers.Name: Growth Spurt
Superpowers.Effect: When this character has 3 or fewer Stamina remaining, increase the Strength of its 'Vine Lash' attack by 2.

Attacks.Name: Solar Beam
Attacks.Effect: This attack requires one turn to charge before it can be used. After charging, on the next activation of this character, use this attack without paying its power cost. If a wild is rolled, the target character is Staggered.

Superpowers.Name: Chlorophyll Boost
Superpowers.Effect: For the rest of the game, this character's movement is increased to 'L'. This superpower can be used only once per game.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Venusaur character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
